item.title: Daily lobste.rs Hottest Page for 2020-12-17
item.description: On the Graying of GNOME (comments) GTK 4.0 (comments) The architecture of IMGZ (comments) Torus Trooper - old-school 3D shooter, written in D 15 years ago (comments) Machine learning could be fundamentally unexplainable (comments) Static calls in Linux 5.10 (comments) Coreutils Gotchas (comments) It’s not legacy code — it’s PHP (comments) Reducing flaky builds by 18x (comments)
